original_text: So he became as much superior to the angels as the name he has inherited is superior to theirs.
korean_text: 그가 천사보다 훨씬 뛰어남은 그들보다 더욱 아름다운 이름을 기업으로 얻으심이니

sentences.original_text: So he became as much superior to angels
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 천사들보다 훨씬 뛰어나게 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: as the name he has inherited
